SetTransparency.short_help: Sets transparency mode to zbuffer, sorted, or quicksort

IsShadowsEnabled.short_help: Returns boolean state of lighting mode

EnableShadows.short_help: Enables or disables shadowing of objects

IsLightingEnabled.short_help: Returns boolean state of lighting mode

EnableLighting.short_help: Enables or disables lighting of objects

IsWireframeEnabled.short_help: Returns boolean state of wireframe mode

EnableWireframe.short_help: Enables or disables wireframe drawing of objects

FitAll.short_help: Fits this view to the entire scene

FitSelected.short_help: Fits this view to the selected object

CenterSelected.short_help: Centers this view on the selected object
